item.title: 告诉HN：概念桌面正在监视您的音频和网络
item.description:
如果您安装了概念桌面应用程序，则可能已经开始注意到“在会议上？开始AI会议记录”时，请弹出通知，当您加入虚拟会议时（例如，在Firefox上加入Google会议）。首先，我认为一定是在使用我的Google Workspace帐户来侦听我的日历。 But then I started to notice it would notify exactly when I joined even if I was late and the meeting had previously started.This was the response from Notion Support after they worked with the Notion Engineering team.> Meeting Detection Architecture:> - The system uses a sophisticated dual-detection approach: microphone monitoring combined with network port analysis> - Detection is implemented separately for macOS and Windows at the native operating system levelI've卸载概念桌面应用...
注释URL： https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=444594790 点：170 ＃评论：30
